name: Total Madness
description:
GRAB A SECOND GAME FREE!

Total Madness is a super fast, super hectic top down survival shooter with tons of weapons, great style and addictive gameplay.


Madness sits on the fence of being a brutal bullet hell, Level up your player and constantly get more bad-ass as you head on a never ending killing spree!


The game features.
  • - Mass amounts of weapons
  • - Leveling system
  • - Many enemy types
  • - Combo System for style points
  • - Online scoreboard!
  • - Complete Madness
